item.title: The National Guard Remains on Duty in L.A. Here’s Why They Aren’t Getting Paid
item.description: Troops were deployed so quickly to the ICE raid protests they can’t get benefits or wages.

item.title: 40 Years Ago, Steve Jobs Said People Who Combine 2 (Seemingly) Opposite Traits Produce Exceptional Results
item.description: Even though people tend to think of themselves as either thinkers or doers, Steve Jobs felt doers were also ‘major’ thinkers.

item.title: 10 Companies Winning at Workplace Culture
item.description: Trying to build a best-in-class company culture? Here’s how the businesses on this year’s Best Workplaces Editors’ List are investing in their teams.

item.title: OUAI Founder Jen Atkin Shares the Advice that Propelled Her 9-Figure Brand
item.description: The entrepreneur and celebrity hairstylist reveals the key early hire that set her business up for success.

item.title: 2025 Best Workplaces: Meet the 514 Companies That Prioritize Their People
item.description: These companies boast best-in-class workplace cultures that put their employees first. Period.
